photoVerificationDialogFailureDescriptio:
Our system has detected potential signs of AI manipulation or found this face in our database, suggesting the person in the photo may not be authentic.

We recommend exercising caution and conducting further verification.
photoVerificationDialogSuccessDescriptio: The person in the photo appears genuine based on our analysis. Our servers thoroughly searched the database, and no matching records were found.
photoVerificationDialogSuccessSubDescrip: Please note that while our system is highly accurate, rare instances of undetected fraudulent activity may occur.
